OS/2

version

OS/2 table version should be 4.

OS/2 table version is '3' but should be 4. Please verify agains job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

post

format

If not CFF, post table format should be 2.

Post table format is 3.0 but should be 2 (except for CJK fonts). Please investigate.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/post

MS ID 2, Subfamily.

ID 2 is 'kursiv' but should be 'Italic' or 'Bold Italic'

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS ID 2, Subfamily.

ID 2 is 'Kursiv' but should be 'Italic' or 'Bold Italic'

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS ID 2, Subfamily.

ID 2 is 'Πλάγια' but should be 'Italic' or 'Bold Italic'

Info

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name, Italic

MS NID 2

MS ID 2 is 'Italic'. Please verify if flags are set correctly.

ID 2 is 'Italic'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'
OS2.fsSelection.bold is 'False'
head.macStyle.bold is 'False'

Error

italic flag

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

head

macStyle italic flag

'head' macStyle italic flag should be set.

'head' macStyle italic flag is: 'True'.

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

post

italic angle

'post' header italic angle should not be 0.

'post' header italic angle is: '-12.0'.

Info

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

-/-

-/-

Check if bold.

It seems to be not bold.
OS2.fsSelection.bold: False
head.macStyle.bold: False

-/-

It seems to be an upright font.

head.macStyle.italic: False

OS/2, usWeightClass

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'
usWeightClass is '700'.
Everything is good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name, Bold Italic

MS NID 2

MS ID 2 should be 'Bold Italic' and OS2.fsSelection.bold = True and head.macStyle.bold = True and OS2.fsSelection.regular = False.

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'

head.macStyle.bold is 'True'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'

name, Bold Italic

Check if tables are present: 'post' table if ttf, 'CFF ' table if otf.

CANNOT check double NULL names. Format 3.0 post table.

Info

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

cmap

uni200B

Check ZERO WIDTH SPACE

Missing uni200B in cmap table.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

395 = 395

CFF

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0020

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0020.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0xFB02

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xFB02.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Italic

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True the OS/2 panose array form flag should be an 'Oblique' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is an 'Oblique' entry.

Pass

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni0000 is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni000D is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Error

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni000D is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'BodoniMTCondensed'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

name

(3, 1, 1027, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Catalan/Subfamily:
'Normal'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Normal'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Warning

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2

Entry: 'Normal'
The keyword 'Normal' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Catalan' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Normal' ≠ 'Regular'.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed', Everything looks good.

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Bodoni MT' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Condensed' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Condensed'.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Regular (Bod_Cr.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 2, Subfamily Name' (MS/BMP/Turkish)

Subfamily Name is present.

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '19'
'Bodoni MT Condensed'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Xtra, Dm, Ultra, Demi, Ex, Semi, Sm, X'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Bodoni MT Condensed'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Bodoni MT Condensed Italic' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Condensed' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.11;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.11'.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'BodoniMTCondensed-Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BodoniMTCondensed'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

NID (3, 1, 1027, 2)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1027, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Catalan/Subfamily:
'Cursiva'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Cursiva'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'BodoniMTCondensed-Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Bodoni MT' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Condensed Italic' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

MS NID 4

Check Width Names Full Font Name NID4

The width name should be before weight name. NID 4 is correct: 'Bodoni MT Condensed Italique'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

NID (3, 1, 1038, 2)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1038, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Hungarian/Subfamily:
'Dőlt'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Dőlt'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Hungarian' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Dőlt' ≠ 'Italic'.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/French (Canada)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Italique' ≠ 'Italic'.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

NID (3, 1, 3084, 4)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 3084, 4) ==> MS/BMP/French (Canada)/Full Name:
'Bodoni MT Condensed Italique'

Critical

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1 (False) and/or NID 2 ((3, 1, 3084, 2)) are missing.

NID 1 and/or 2 are missing, but NID 4 (3, 1, 3084, 4). Please add.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Bodoni MT Condensed'
MS is: 'Bodoni MT Condensed'

Pass

Entries are different.

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 16, Typographic Family Name' (MS/BMP/Portuguese (Brazil))

Typographic Family Name NID 16 (MS/BMP/Portuguese (Brazil)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Version NID 5 (MS/BMP/French (Canada)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Critical

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Windows NID 6 (MS/BMP/French (Canada))

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 6, PostScript Name' (MS/BMP/French (Canada))

PostScript Name NID 6 (MS/BMP/French (Canada)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 16, Typographic Family Name' (MS/BMP/French (Canada))

Typographic Family Name NID 16 (MS/BMP/French (Canada)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Italic (Bod_Ci.ttf)

name

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 17, Typographic Subfamily Name' (MS/BMP/French (Canada))

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (MS/BMP/French (Canada)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

Mac NID 6

Pass

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 2 is not the same 'Normal' ≠ 'Regular'.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Agfa Monotype Corporation' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS NID 2

NID 2 is not the same 'Normal' ≠ 'Regular'.

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

NID (3, 1, 1045, 2)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1045, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Polish/Subfamily:
'Normalny'

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Normalny'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Warning

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2

Entry: 'Normalny'
The keyword 'Normal' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Error

Bodoni MT Regular (Bod_R.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
MS is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Pass

MS is: 'Bodoni MT'

Windows NID 2 (MS/BMP/Norwegian)

Subfamily Name is present.

Error

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (MS/BMP/Spanish (Mexico)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Critical

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '9'
'Bodoni MT'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'BodoniMT-Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '9'
'Bodoni MT'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Xtra, Dm, Ultra, Demi, Ex, Semi, Sm, X'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Bodoni MT Italic' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

'Bodoni MT Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.11;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.11'.

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'BodoniMT-Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Agfa Monotype Corporation' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

(3, 1, 1034, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)/Subfamily:
'Cursiva'

Error

Bodoni MT Italic (Bod_I.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Cursiva' ≠ 'Italic'.

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Slovak' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Kurzíva' ≠ 'Italic'.

Error

'Bodoni MT Kurzíva'

'Bodoni MT Kurzíva'

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
MS is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Version NID 5 (MS/BMP/Czech) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'BodoniMTCondensed-Bold'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1031, 4) ==> MS/BMP/German (Germany)/Full Name:
'Bodoni MT Condensed Fett'

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'BodoniMTCondensed-Bold'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® Condensed is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Bodoni MT' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Condensed Bold' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

NID 2 is not the same 'Halvfet' ≠ 'Bold'.

Error

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Bodoni MT'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

name

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Condensed Bold'

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Typographic Family Name NID 16 (MS/BMP/Slovak) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold (Bod_Cb.ttf)

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '19'
'Bodoni MT Condensed'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Xtra, Dm, Ultra, Demi, Ex, Semi, Sm, X'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Bodoni MT Condensed'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

OK: NID 2 is 'Bold Italic'

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '31'
'Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Condensed' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '28' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'BodoniMTCondensed-BoldItalic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTCondensed-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (C) 1999 Monotype Typography, Inc. All rights reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

name

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Bodoni MT' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Condensed Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

NID 2 is 'Negrita Cursiva'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Error

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31, otherwise it does not work in MS Word 2011/Mac.

NID 4 length is '32' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Bodoni MT Condensed Kalın İtalik'

Critical

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1 (False) and/or NID 2 ((3, 1, 1055, 2)) are missing.

NID 1 and/or 2 are missing, but NID 4 (3, 1, 1055, 4). Please add.

Pass

Bodoni MT Condensed Bold Italic (Bod_Cbi.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Check Width Names Full Font Name NID4

The width name should be before weight name. NID 4 is correct: 'Bodoni MT Condensed Kalın İtalik'

Error

Windows NID 1 (MS/BMP/Dutch (Netherlands))

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 1, Family Name' (MS/BMP/Dutch (Netherlands))

Family Name NID 1 (MS/BMP/Dutch (Netherlands)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '9'
'Bodoni MT'

Pass

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'BodoniMT-Bold'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/German (Germany)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Fett' ≠ 'Bold'.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '9'
'Bodoni MT'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Bodoni MT Bold' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'BodoniMT-Bold'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

MS NID 6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Agfa Monotype Corporation' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold (Bod_B.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Bodoni MT'

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'BodoniMT-BoldItalic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

'Negreta cursiva'

name

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'tučné kurzíva'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Czech' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'tučné kurzíva' ≠ 'Bold Italic'.

Error

'Bodoni MT tučné kurzíva'

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '9'
'Bodoni MT'

Pass

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Bodoni MT Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'BodoniMT-BoldItalic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMT-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BoldItalic'

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Agfa Monotype Corporation' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Dutch (Netherlands)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Vet Cursief' ≠ 'Bold Italic'.

Error

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
MS is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Bodoni MT'
MS is: 'Bodoni MT'

Pass

Mac and MS NID 6

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'BodoniMT-BoldItalic'
MS is: 'BodoniMT-BoldItalic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Bold Italic (Bod_Bi.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 7

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
MS is: 'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Error

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Error

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '15'
'Bodoni MT Black'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

name

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Extra, Xtra, Dm, Ultra, Demi, Ex, Semi, Sm, X'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Bodoni MT Black'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'BodoniMTBlack'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Agfa Monotype Corporation', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.agfamonotype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/designer/des_index.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Agfa Monotype Corporation' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display and print content as permitted by the license terms, or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.agfamonotype.com/html/type/license.html, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Bodoni MT' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Bodoni MT Black'.

Pass

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1045, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Polish/Subfamily:
'Normalny'

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Normalny'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Warning

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2

Entry: 'Normalny'
The keyword 'Normal' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Polish' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Normalny' ≠ 'Regular'.

Error

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

Bodoni MT Black Regular (Bod_Blar.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
MS is: 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

Pass

MS is: 'Bodoni MT Black'

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 17, Typographic Subfamily Name' (MS/BMP/Danish)

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (MS/BMP/Danish) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Critical

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Critical

Bodoni MT Black Italic (Bod_Blai.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright Monotype Typography, Ltd 1999. All rights reserved. Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Monotype Typography, Ltd which may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Bodoni MT Black'

Bodoni MT Black Italic (Bod_Blai.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'BodoniMTBlack-Italic'

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Italic (Bod_Blai.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTBlack-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Bodoni MT Black Italic (Bod_Blai.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'BodoniMTBlack-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this
'Monotype Bodoni® is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)
